Dependency Information

Apache Maven

<dependency>
  <groupId>com.googlecode.maven-download-plugin</groupId>
  <artifactId>download-maven-plugin</artifactId>
  <version>1.5.1</version>
  <type>maven-plugin</type>
</dependency>

Apache Buildr

'com.googlecode.maven-download-plugin:download-maven-plugin:maven-plugin:1.5.1'

Apache Ant

<dependency org="com.googlecode.maven-download-plugin" name="download-maven-plugin" rev="1.5.1">
  <artifact name="download-maven-plugin" type="maven-plugin" />
</dependency>

Groovy Grape

@Grapes(
@Grab(group='com.googlecode.maven-download-plugin', module='download-maven-plugin', version='1.5.1')
)

Grails

compile 'com.googlecode.maven-download-plugin:download-maven-plugin:1.5.1'

Leiningen

[com.googlecode.maven-download-plugin/download-maven-plugin "1.5.1"]

SBT

libraryDependencies += "com.googlecode.maven-download-plugin" %% "download-maven-plugin" % "1.5.1"
